resources.string: Unable to create a soft token identity:
The serial number was entered incorrectly. Check the number and try again.
The activation code was entered incorrectly. Check the number and try again.
Your soft token identity needs to be protected with a %d digit PIN.
The PIN values do not match. Re-enter your PIN.
Enter the registration code below into the Self-Service web page, or give it to your help-desk to complete adding the Identity.
Have you used the registration code yet? It will not be displayed again.

There was an error generating a confirmation code for the transaction. Ensure that the details are correct and try again. If the problem persists, try repeating the action that generated the transaction.
There was a problem attempting to complete the transaction, please try your response again.
Enter the confirmation code below in your online application to complete the transaction.
The activation launch link was invalid. Contact your identity provider and try again.
There was an error scanning the QR code or the data returned was invalid.
The scanned transaction cannot be validated. It may have been corrupted or tampered with.
This link is secured by a password. Enter the password to continue.
Please find the requested log files attached. These logs were captured on %s.
